sentences.sentence: "It is a mahogany splinter, "said the other.
The woman exclaimed, and thence the proverb: It is so mahogany!
sentences.translation: 那女人叫了起来，因此才有了这句谚语：这是多么美丽的桃花心木啊！

sentences.sentence: The word "mahogany" can be understood, in Danish, as having two meanings.
sentences.translation: “红木”这个词在丹麦语中，可以理解为有两个意思。
